sentences.en: They aim their advice squarely at nubile girls who have falsely equated romantic love with happiness.
sentences.cn: 其目的是如实地建议就要结婚的女孩,不要错误地认为,浪漫的爱情就是幸福.

sentences.en: What is this current television obsession with older men and nubile young women?
sentences.cn: 现在的电视节目为什么这么喜欢描写老男人和妙龄性感女郎的故事呢？

trans.tran_en: a woman who is nubile is young and sexually attractive – sometimes used humorously
